attributes.action: Stop wasting money on phoney wars and start funding health, medical research and help stop poverty and disease in the third world.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should we be paying our taxes to fund death and destruction when we are supposed to be a 'civilised' country. Let the USA wage their own wars. We could start something great in the World and be proud of it, by helping to cure disease in this country and the third world. Trident is a waste of money. Think of the benefits we can give to the people of the UK and the World with Billions of pounds pumped into health and trying to stop poverty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
